DOC.brief_summary: The study recruit healthy volunteer undergo Iontophoresis procedure use Acclarent Iontophoresis System Earset ( IPSES ) .
DOC.criteria: At least 12 month old Pregnant lactating female Subjects history sensitivity reaction lidocaine , tetracaine , epinephrine , hypersensitivity local anesthetic amide type , component drug solution Significantly atrophic perforate tympanic membrane Otitis externa Damaged denude skin auditory canal Electrically sensitive subject subject electrically sensitive support system ( pacemaker , defibrillator , etc . ) Cerumen impaction result significant amount cleaning require visualize tympanic membrane Evidence Otitis Media day procedure , within past three ( 3 ) month prior procedure .
